game.name: Linkies
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 광활한 우주에 홀로 남겨진 당신! 혼자 있으면 약해집니다. Linky를 데리고 도전에 맞서세요! Linkies는 깨지지 않는 유대감을 형성하고 당신을 더 빠르고 강하게 만들어주는 협동 게임입니다! 우주의 끝까지 도달할 수 있을까요?
game.shortDescriptionEn: You find yourself all alone in the vastness of outer space! Being alone makes you slow and weak. Take your Linky with you and confront the challenges head-on! Linkies is a co-op game that creates unbreakable bonds and makes you faster and stronger! Can you make it to the end of space?
